start: ^Hi Georgie, good to see you! Can I get what I got last time -- the americano with cream?

g-0: ^I'm so tired today... can I get an extra shot of espresso?
^Of course! How come you're extra tired?
^That'll be a dollar upcharge, sorry about that.

c-2: ^I was up so late last night sorting through all my old songs. I've had some songs written for years, and I'm having a hard time deciding what to include on my first album.

g-1: ^I've really been writing songs since I was a kid. Did you have any hobbies growing up?
^Actually, I've always loved to crochet and create things. My grandma taught me how to crochet when I was eight years old, and I've been hooked ever since.

c-4: ^That's so cool! Maybe you could show me how to crochet someday.

g-2: ^I just wish I had more time to focus on my music. I have to resort to staying up late, and drinking a lot of coffee to have the energy to work on it after work.
^Someday you could be doing music full time, I believe it.

c-7: ^I guess you're right... work comes first.

g-3: ^See you soon Georgie, hope the rest of your day goes well.
